article_title: CMO Today: Verizon And Hearst Team Up For Mobile Joint Venture
article_text: RED STATE RUSH: Earlier this year, CMO Today reported that Hearst and Verizon were in talks for a joint venture that would produce a digital video brand along the lines of “Vice for the red states.” Now that project is here: RatedRed.com will feature content geared toward millennials in the heartland. And Ted Cruz-supporting teens must be rejoicing in the streets! Seriously.TV, a separate digital video project, will focus on political comedy. There’s really no shortage of political or comedy video content out there, but the bet is that there are young people who want more of it on their phones. Unsurprisingly,...

Seriously.TV, a separate digital video project, will focus on political comedy.
There’s really no shortage of political or comedy video content out there, but the bet is that there are young people who want more of it on their phones.

And Ted Cruz-supporting teens must be rejoicing in the streets!
